data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Of Team India Guaranty Limited (Formerly Known As Times Guaranty Limited) (The Company) To Be Held On Friday 13Th February 2026
data.news_body:
Team India Guaranty Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday 13th February 2026 to consider and approve inter aliato;

1. Consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 along with the Limited Review Report; and

2. Consider and transit any other business as may be placed before the Board.

Further as intimated by our letter dated 24th December 2025 in view of the declaration of financial results the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company for its designated persons has been closed with effect from Thursday 01st  January 2026 and will remain closed till the end of 48 hours after the declaration of said financial results to the Stock Exchange(s).

data.news_body:

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body:
In continuation to our letter dated 12th September 2025 wherein we submitted the outcome of the 35th AGM of the company we wish to inform you that the all the resolutions have been passed by the members with the requisite majority.

Please find enclosed herewith the following.
1. Scrutinizer Consolidated Report dated 12th September 2025 on e-voting during the AGM issued by Aabid & Co. Practicing Company Secretaries in respect of the 35th AGM of the Company.
2. Details regarding the voting results of the business transacted at the said meeting pursuant to Regulation 44(3) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the shareholders of the company at the 35th AGM held on Friday 12th September 2025 have approved the Appointment of M/s. Aabid & Co. Company Secretaries as the Secretarial Auditor of the Company for a periood of Five Consecutive years.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment of Statutory Auditor/s
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the shareholders of Company at the 35th Annual General Meeting held on Friday 12th September 2025 have approved the Appointment of M/s. V.B. Goel & Co. Chartered Accountant (FRN: 115906W) as the Statutory Auditor of the Company for a period of Five Consecutive years from the conclusion of the 35th AGM until the conclusion of 40th AGM of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Preferential Issue
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with schedule III of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Shareholders of the Company at its Annual General Meeting held today i.e. Friday 12th September 2025 have considered and approved the offer issue and allotment of equity shares of the Company on a preferential basis for consideration other than cash in compliance with applicable laws.

In accordant with the Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are submitting herewith the summary of the proceeding of the 35th AGM of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Madam

Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 as amended (SEBI LODR Regulations) we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 13th August 2025 inter alia considered and approved the acquisition of upto 100% of equity shareholding of 4A Financial Technologies Private Limited (Target Company) . The said acquisition is proposed to be effected by way of preferential allotment of equity  shares of the Company for consideration other than cash through a share swap arrangement in compliance with applicable laws.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Issue of Securities
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Madam

Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations) we wish to inform you that the Board of Director of the Company at its meeting held today i.e Wednesday 13th August 2025 inter alia considered and approved the offer issue and allotment of Equity shares of the company on a preferential basis for consideration other than cash in compliance with applicable laws.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Madam

The Board of Directors of Team India Guaranty Limited at its meeting held on August 13 2025 approved issuing 2248270 equity shares at Rs.285/- per share on a preferential issue to acquire up to 100% equity of 4A Financial Technologies Pvt. Ltd. subject to necessary approvals.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body:
Times Guaranty Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In continuation of our earlier intimation dated 05th August 2025 we wish to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 29(1) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 a meeting of the Board of Directors of Team India Guaranty Limited (formerly known as Times Guaranty Limited) (the Company) is scheduled to be held on Wednesday 13th August 2025.

In addition to the matters already intimated the Board will also consider the following additional agenda item at the said meeting:

To consider transactions involving the Company which may include issuance of equity shares and/or any other securities of the Company through a preferential issue for consideration other than cash subject to such regulatory/statutory approvals as may be required including approval of the shareholders which shall be taken through requisite means as may be approved by the Board of Directors of the Company

1. Consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 along with the Limited Review Report; and

2. Consider and transit any other businesses as may be placed before the Board.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change of Company Name
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)and further to our intimations dated June 12 2025 we wish to inform you that the Registrar of Companies Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) has approved the change in name of the company from "Times Guaranty Limited" to "Team India Guaranty Limited" with effect from 01.07.2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
This is to inform that in pursuance to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and Companys Code of conduct to prevent insider trading The Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for considering the unaudited Financials Results for the First Quarter ended 30th June 2025 and other allied matters with effect from the end of day Monday 30th June 2025 and shall remain closed till 48hrs of conclusion of the Board Meeting at which the said unaudited  financial results shall be approved. The date of the said Board Meeting be intimidated separately.
Accordingly all insiders/designated persons and their immediate relatives covered under the mentioned Code are advised not to trade in the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of closure of trading window

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
We would like to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today i.e. 11th June 2025 have inter-alia considered and approved the following matters:
1. Approved a resolution confirming that the Company has neither accepted any public deposits nor intends to accept any public deposits in the future in accordance with the applicable RBI guidelines;
2. Approved the registration of the Company with the regulated authorities in relation to the commencement of lending activities.
3. Adoption of various new policies and review of existing policies in line with regulatory requirements.
4. Appointment of Ms. Aarti Pandey as the Chief Grievance Redressal Officer (CGRO) of the Company
5. Delegated the power under section 179(3)(f) of companies act 2013 to Mr. Manoj Agrawal (CFO) and Niru Kanodia (CEO) for granting loans and further designate Mr. Manoj Agrawal (CFO) as Credit Head of the Company.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyTimes Guaranty Ltd
2CIN NO.L65920MH1989PLC054398
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY 0
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)Not Applicable
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Aarti Pandey
Designation: Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
EmailId: newberryaarti@gmail.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Manoj Agrawal
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: manoj@timl.in

Date: 28/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 please find enclosed herewith a Certificate received from M/s MUFG  Intime India Private Limited Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company for the quarter ended 31st March 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI LODR Regulation 2015 we here by file revise intimation for Completion of the term of Mrs. Anita Rajendra Malsure as Executive Director and Chief Executive Director.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 and as per mail from BSE we wish to inform you that Mrs. Anita Rajendra Malsure has completed her term as Executive Director and Chief Executive Director (ED and CEO). Accordingly she has ceased to be the ED and CEO of the Company

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that Mrs. Anita Rajendra Malsure (DIN: 07773062) has completed term as Executive Director and Chief Executive Officer (ED and CEO) with effect from the close of business hours on 28th March 2025

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Appointment Of Mrs. Anita Rajendra Malusare As An Additional /   Non-Executive Director
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we hereby inform the Stock Exchange that the Board of Directors through Circular Resolution has approved the appointment of Mrs. Anita Rajendra Malusare as Additional  / Non-Executive Director of the Company w.e.f 29th March 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: This is to inform you that in pursuance of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 as amended and Companys code of conduct to prevent Insider Trading the Trading window for dealing in the securities of the company has been closed for considering the Audited Standalone Financials Results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March 2025 and other allied matters with effect from Tuesday 01st April 2025 and shall remain closed till 48hours of the conclusion of the Board Meeting at which the said Audited Standalone Financial Results shall be approved.

data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Certificate pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants Regulation 2018 for the quarter ended 31.12.2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and Regulation 47 of SEBI (Listing obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015. Please find enclosed herewith the newspaper advertisement for the Extract of the Standalone Unaudited Financial Results of Times Guaranty Ltd for the quarter ended 31.12.2024 published in all editions of Financial Express (English) and Mumbai Lakshadweep (Marathi) on 14th February 2025.

data.caption: Integrated Filing (Financial)
data.news_body: Please find attached Integrated filing (Financial) of Times Guaranty Limited for the quarter ended 31.12.2024

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you the Stock Exchange that the Board of Directors in their Meeting held on Wednesday 12th February 2025 has approved the Appointment of Mr. Manoj Agrawal as CFO of the Company w.e.f 12.02.2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 read with Para A of Schedule III thereto we hereby inform the Stock Exchange that the Board of Directors of the company in their meeting held on Wednesday 12.02.2025 has approve the resignation of Mr. Pramod Karmarkar as CFO of the company w.e.f 12.0.2025

data.descriptor: Appointment of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Appointment of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 we hereby inform the Stock Exchange that the Board of Directors in their Meeting held on Wednesday 12th February 2025 has approved the Appointment of Ms. Aarti Pandy as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company w.e.f 12.02.2025

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12Th February 2025 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 12th February 2025 approved the following:
1. Financial Results: Unaudited Standalone Financials Results for the Quarter ended 31st December 2024(Annexure A)

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12Th February 2025 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at its meeting held on 12th February 2025 approved the following:
1. Financial Results: Unaudited Standalone Financials Results for the Quarter ended 31st December 2024(Annexure A)

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12Th February 2025 Pursuant To Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligation And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulati
data.news_body:
Dear Sir/Madam
The Board of Directors at its meeting held today approved the following:
1. Financial Results: Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December 2024 (Annexure-A).
2. Company Secretary: Appointment of Ms. Aarti Pandey as Company Secretary & Compliance Officer (Annexure-B).
3. CFO Resignation: Acceptance of Mr. Pramod Gajanan Karmarkars resignation (Annexure-C).
4. CFO Appointment: Appointment of Mr. Manoj Agrawal as CFO & KMP (Annexure-D).
The meeting commenced at 03:45 p.m. and concluded at 04:01 p.m.
Kindly take this on record.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer"s Report
data.news_body: Please find herewith the Scrutinizers Report for the E-voting of the Postal Ballot held from January 7 2025 to February 5 2025.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of Postal_Ballot
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 44(3) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby enclose herewith copy of Postal Ballot Result along with Scrutinizer Report.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Of Times Guaranty Limited (The Company) To Be Held On Wednesday 12Th February 2025
data.news_body:
TIMES GUARANTY LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 29 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Wednesday 12th February 2025 to consider and approve inter alia the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2024.

Further as intimated by our letter dated 30th December 2024 in view of the declaration of financial results and other allied matters the Trading Window for dealing in the securities of the Company for its designated persons has been closed from end of day of Tuesday 31st December 2024 and will remain closed till  48 hours after the declaration of Un-audited Financial Results for the Quarter ended 31st December 2024 to the Stock Exchange(s).

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 please find enclosed herewith a certificate a Certificate received from M/s Link Intime India Private Limited the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III Para A Part A of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations 2015. We hereby inform you that the newspaper advertisement regarding the notice of Postal Ballot and Remote e-voting to seek approval from the members of the Company has been published in all editions of "Financial Express" (English) and "Mumbai Lakshadweep" (Marathi) on 07th Day of January 2025.
A copy of the Newspaper advertisement is enclosed for your reference and records.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed a copy of the Postal Ballot Notice ("Notice")  dated 3rd January 2025 seeking Shareholders Approval for the following special business through a Postal Ballot;
Regularization of the following directors as;
1. Mr. Ashok Anant Paranjpe (DIN: 07440788) as Non-Executive Independent Director
2. Mrs. Sreedevi Pillai (DIN: 08944944) as Non-Executive Independent Director
3. Mr. Satish Maruti Mangutkar (DIN:10436913) as Non- Executive Director
4. Mr. Surajkumar Omprakash Saraogi (DIN:00004498) as Non-Executive Director
5. Mrs. Niru Shiv Kumar Kanodia (DIN:02651444) as Executive Director.

This is for your information and records.

data.caption: Intimation Of Change In Name Of Registrar And Share Transfer Agent (RTA) Of The Company
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that Link Intime India Private Limited The Registrar and Share Transfer Agent (RTA) of the company has changed its name to MUFG intime India Private Limited with effect from 31st December 2024.

Kindly take the same in your records.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: This is to inform that Pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and companys code of conduct to prevent from Insider Trading the Trading window for dealing in securities of the company has been closed for considering unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2024 and allied matters with effect from end of day of Tuesday 31st December 2024  and shall remain closed till 48hours of conclusion of the Board Meeting shall be intimated Separately.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 Regarding Availability Of New Name Under Section 4(5) Of
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI(LODR) Regulation 2015 we are pleased to inform you that Our company Times Guaranty Limited has received on 23rd December 2024 a letter from MCA confirming the availability of the proposed new name of the Company i.e. "Team India Guaranty Limited".

data.caption: Intimation Pursuant To Regulation 31A Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, As Amended ('SEBI Listing Regulations') - Submission Of Application For Reclassification From Promoter Category To Public Category
data.news_body: Dear Sir/ Madam,In continuation of our earlier intimations dated 07th November 2024 and 14th November 2024 we wish to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 31A of SEBI Listing Regulations the company has submitted an application with the Stock Exchanges i.e. BSE Ltd and National Stock Exchange (NSE) on 12th December 2024, seeking their approval for re-classification of Promoter i.e Bennett, Coleman & Company Limited from Promoter category to public category.
